title: My Painting Tips
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aapko apni painting tips batane wali hoon.

Anushka: Painting shuru kaise karein? Bas, shuru ho jao! Perfection ki chinta mat karo.

Anushka: Mera pehla tip: Rangon se dosti karo! Different colors milao, dekho kya naya banta hai. Experiment!

Anushka: Dusra tip: Light and shadow. Yeh important hai! Light kahaan hai? Shadow kahaan? Isse painting mein jaan aati hai.

Anushka: Teesra tip: Reference photos use karo, lekin copy mat karo. Usse inspiration lo, apni imagination dalo.

Anushka: Chautha tip: Galti se mat daro! Galtiyan toh hoti hain. Unse seekho, aur aage badho.

Anushka: Aur aakhri tip: Patience rakho! Painting mein time lagta hai. Practice makes perfect, suna hai na?

Anushka: Ek choti si kahani sunati hoon. Ek baar, maine ek painting banayi. Bohot kharab bani. Main frustrated thi.

Anushka: Lekin maine usko discard nahi kiya. Maine usse seekha. Aur agli painting behtar bani.

Anushka: Toh doston, painting sirf technique nahi hai. Yeh feeling hai, yeh passion hai.

Anushka: Toh brush uthao, rang dalo, aur duniya ko apna rang dikhao! Dhanyavaad!
